attributes.action: Stop vets over charging our pets to maximize. There profits
attributes.background:
Vets are over charging  our pets by hundreds my dog was in vets over the weekend  for a chemotherapy  infection  was bill £712 but itemized  bill when took pet in was £233 ...
this needs sorting a vet can take £4k insurance on a couple of accidents Pets need affordable  vet costs not over priced

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the fees charged by vets.
